thread.title: China seizes control of Anbang, chairman prosecuted

title: China seizes control of Anbang, chairman prosecuted
text:
China seizes control of Anbang, chairman prosecuted 11:38am GMT - 01:45 
The Chinese government seizes control of Anbang Insurance and says its chairman has been prosecuted, a dramatic move that highlights Beijing's willingness to curtail big-spending conglomerates as it cracks down on financial risk. David Pollard reports.
